responsibilities: Design and build advanced data science and algorithm solutions to solve business problems such as fraud prevention, AML, user experience customization, and optimization.
Understand the payment business and translate business problems into data science and algorithm solutions.
Apply cutting-edge machine learning technologies in various payment business use cases.
Own end-to-end model solution lifecycle and work with stakeholders to deliver business impact.
Improve modeling infrastructures, labels, features, and algorithms for robustness, automation, and generalization.
Enhance risk machine learning excellence in privacy/compliance, interoperability, risk perception, and analysis.
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The job responsibilities focus on designing and building data science and algorithm solutions, applying machine learning technologies, and improving modeling infrastructures. While these tasks involve advanced data science and machine learning, they do not specifically mention language models or the fine-tuning and customization of such models. The responsibilities are more aligned with general machine learning and data science applications in the payment business context, such as fraud prevention and risk analysis, rather than domain-specific language model tasks.
